name: roobie
description: Centralized CSS and JavaScript for Advanced Web Development.
author: Kyle Grewe

scripts.build: npm-run-all build:css build:css:bare build:css:prod build:js build:js:bare build:js:prod docs
scripts.build:css: cat src/animations/*.css src/animations/**/*.css  src/components/**/*.css src/core/*.css src/layout/*.css src/themes/*.css src/utilities/*.css > roobie.css
scripts.build:css:bare: cat src/animations/*.css src/animations/**/*.css  src/components/**/*.css src/core/*.css src/layout/*.css src/utilities/*.css > roobie-bare.css
scripts.build:css:prod: minify roobie.css > roobie.min.css && minify roobie-bare.css > roobie-bare.min.css
scripts.build:js: cat src/animations/*.js src/components/**/*.js src/themes/*.js src/utilities/*.js > roobie.js
scripts.build:js:prod: minify roobie.js > roobie.min.js && minify roobie-bare.js > roobie-bare.min.js
